data: {"generalSituation":"A dry northeast monsoon will continue to bring generally fine weather to Guangdong today. It will be warm during the day over the region. An intense winter monsoon is expected to start affecting southern China gradually tomorrow. Winds will strengthen over the region. It will become cold over the coast of Guangdong in the following couple of days. Meanwhile, a broad band of clouds will cover the region. Under the influence of an easterly airstream, temperatures over the coast of southern China will rise slightly during the weekend but it will still be cool in the mornings. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Nokaen will move across the seas east of the Philippines in the next couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260119","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East force 3 to 4, occasionally force 5 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Fine.
